entry.source: This is a job from Q the blacksmith.{F801}He requires {F804,5}{F878,1}{F804,0} {F804,5}{F872,1}{F804,0}s.{F801}Gryphons may be strong, but they can be beaten.{F801}Also, he said he'd start selling the{F801}{F804,5}"Bone Sword"{F804,0} at his shop, which{F801}would be perfect for you guys. Best of luck!{F801}
